colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI SDOM BRTZON CHOS LA 'DUN PA'I DPYOD LDAN AER DHE NI TI YANG CHI BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG STOBS LDAN NO, ,'DI'I BRGYUD PA NI RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG, RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA, SLOB DPON ABHYA KA RA, SHU BHA KA RA KUPTA, SU TZA RI KA RA KUPTA, RATNA RAKshI TA, GO RAm SHRI RATNA KIRTI, LO TZTSA BA GRAGS RGYAL, RONG PA SHES RAB SENG GE ,SAG STON GZHON NU TSUL KHRIMS, MKHON SHES RAB RDO RJE, MKHAN CHEN RIN CHEN 'PHEL, SLOB DPON KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS, MKHAN CHEN BYANG CHUB SENG GE ,MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI 'OD ZER, BLA MA BSOD NAMS BZANG PO, CHOS RJE NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN, RDO RJE 'CHAN MKHYEN RAB RJE, KUN MKHYEN SH'AKY'A DON GRUB, 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' LEGS GRUB, BYAMS PA KUN DGA' CHOS GRAGS, 'DREN MCHOG MCHOG LEGS RDO RJE, MKHYEN RAB BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO, MKHYEN RAB BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG LHUN GRUB, DES BDAG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN LA'O,, ,,
